### Neofetch version

-


### Verbose log

Add `set -x` to the second line of the script, the script should look like this:

```sh
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -x
# vim: fdm=marker:noai:ts=4:sw=4
#
# Neofetch info about your system
# https://github.com/dylanaraps/neofetch
```

Run neofetch

-
